item.description: Leisure, the Individual, and Contemporary Society # Syllabus # File: rpta125-syllabus.pdf Notes during orientation # the greyed out rows on the tentative schedule in the syllabus are weeks when we don’t meet via Zoom minimum of 5000 words total for the class broken up into smaller assignments 2 large papers, several smaller papers, several discussions
